name: Meteor (itch) (CheshireCatGames)
description:
This is a game developed in the discipline of Algorithm and Data Structures using a C++ language.

Sound and Art Designer: Matheus de Moura.

Development: Pedro Junqueira and Matheus de Moura.

Meteor is a 2D arcade arcade game in the style of Space Invaders! The game consists of dodging a meteor shower for as long as you can!

(Some meteors have 1, 2 or 3 lifes!)
